title: Bugsplat kicked me out of my series
body: So I joined up for a game and loaded then bugsplat crashed my league and kicked me out of my series making me fall back to 68lp...

replies.body:
Shoot, terrible timing for a Bugsplat; I wish I could say I could reinstate that promo but it sadly isn't possible. However, what is possible is assuring that bugsplats like that don't happen again.

Some good initial troubleshooting we can try is making sure that both your [**graphics card drivers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2) and your **[Direct X](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq3)** are updated and functioning properly with these steps. Both of these are essentially tools that your computer uses to operate and communicate different parts of itself together in order to run the game, but if one or both fall short, it forces the game to crash. Try the steps and load up some Custom Games a few times to make sure things work better, and let me know the results!
